stellactrumMatchInfo: If the card's [Stellactrum Match] fully meets the stage's requirements use protocores with main stats like [DMG Boost to Weakened] or [Oath Recovery Boost], otherwise prioritize [CRIT DMG], [CRIT Rate] and [Expedited Energy Boost].
introSolar: Sometimes 5★ companions require slightly different builds. For solar pairs, the β protocore might change depending on your companion's Rank.
chooseProtocores: choose protocores based on your needs

substatsChoice.basic: For substats, priorities protocores with ATK, ATK Bonus, CRIT Rate, CRIT DMG, DMG Boost to Weakened

solar.abysswalker: ATK, ATK Bonus, CRIT Rate, CRIT DMG, DMG Boost to Weakened
solar.god_of_the_tides: HP, HP Bonus, CRIT Rate, CRIT DMG, DMG Boost to Weakened
solar.lemurian_sea_god: DEF, DEF Bonus, CRIT Rate, CRIT DMG, DMG Boost to Weakened

solarCardsInfo: Solar cards use [α] and [β] protocores. [α] has a fixed main HP stat, while [β]'s main stat derives.
lunarCardsInfo: Lunar cards use [γ] and [δ] protocores. [γ] has a fixed main ATK stat, while [δ]'s main stat derives.
critBuildsInfo: For crit builds, don't forget to check your [CRIT Rate] before entering a stage. For comfortable ratio, aim for 60-80% [CRIT Rate]. Remember that your [CRIT DMG] doesn't matter if you do not utilize it.
OathInfo: Usually, your companion can use [Ardent Oath] once per  battle. To use it twice, use [Oath Recovery Boost] as you β protocore.
energyInfo: [Active Skill] and [Resonance Skill] require special energy ◆, to regenerate it faster, use [Expedited Energy Boost] as your β protocore.
